description: This Dart file defines a custom Flutter theme named 'Ocean Professional' with specific color schemes, styles for app bar, cards, input decorations, tab bar, chips, and page transitions. It also provides a background gradient decoration function. The theme is constructed using Material 3 design principles, customizing various UI components for a consistent look and feel.

methods.name: buildOceanProfessionalTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object styled with ocean-like colors, rounded shapes, and modern UI components, suitable for a Flutter app following Material 3 guidelines.

methods.name: oceanGradientBackground
methods.description: Provides a BoxDecoration with a subtle top-to-bottom linear gradient using semi-transparent blue and gray colors, intended for background decoration.
